DOC.brief_summary: A study for the treatment of Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) in patients previously treated with chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: LUCY: A Study for the Treatment of Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) in Patients Previously Treated With Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Histologically or cytologically confirmed nonsmall cell lung cancer. Prior chemotherapy regimen(s) for lung cancer History of other malignancy in the last 5 years Major surgery within the past 21 days
